author: mrdylanroberts
name: Glossary
short: Interactive cybersecurity glossary with user contributions
description: A comprehensive cybersecurity glossary cog that allows users to browse terms with pagination, search for definitions, and contribute new terms. Features moderation system, alphabetical sorting, and Discord UI integration.
install_msg: Thanks for installing Glossary! Use `!glossary` to view the cybersecurity glossary, `!glossary add` to contribute terms, and `!glossary config` to configure settings.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user-submitted glossary terms and definitions, including the author's user ID and display name for moderation purposes.
